FPV Drone Racing

All About FPV Drone Racing

What Is A Drone

A drone is an unmanned aircraft or ship that is guided remotely. In this case a First Person View (FPV) Drone is a quadcopter with a wirless video system attached to it.

What Are Drones Used For

Drones have mny uses, racing being one of them. Drones can also be used for search and rescue in emergencies, aerial navigation. Some drones are even used in the militart.

Different Types Of Drones

There are lots of different types of drones, the most used types are racing drones, commercial use drones, and recreational drones.
